issue.title: Configuring gazebojs to connect to different masters

content.raw:
That works for me: I started 2 servers on different ports, and I was able to connect to either. I confess I did not try it with a server on a different machine, but I can confirm that the GAZEBO_MASTER_URI is taken into account.

What does not work is trying to connect to 2 instances of gzserver from the same node program. But that is a different issue.
content.html:
That works for me: I started 2 servers on different ports, and I was able to connect to either. I confess I did not try it with a server on a different machine, but I can confirm that the GAZEBO_MASTER_URI is taken into account.

What does not work is trying to connect to 2 instances of gzserver from the same node program. But that is a different issue.
